This is an unnamed ability possessed by [[Black Zetsu]] that allows it to record events that it has personally witnessed. 

== Usage ==
When used in conjunction with its signature [[Mayfly]] technique, Black Zetsu can gather data from battles without being detected. In order to show these recordings to others, it must first [[Body Coating|merge]] with the recipient. Black Zetsu, over the centuries, claims it was able to record the entire history of [[shinobi]] to later show its creator, [[Kaguya Ōtsutsuki]], after her revival.<ref name="ch681">''Naruto'' chapter 681</ref>

== Known Events Recorded ==
* The [[Ten-Tails]]' sealing.<ref name="ch681"/>
* The [[Six Paths — Chibaku Tensei|creation]] of the [[moon]].<ref name="ch681"/>
* [[Hagoromo Ōtsutsuki]] teaching [[ninshū]] to his sons, [[Indra]] and [[Asura Ōtsutsuki]].<ref name="ch681"/>
* Its own temptation of Indra.<ref name="ch681"/>
* The fight between [[Madara Uchiha]] and [[Hashirama Senju]].<ref name="ch681"/>
* Madara's first [[Transcription Seal: Izanagi|revival]] and subsequent implantation of Hashirama's DNA.<ref name="ch681"/>
* Madara awakening the [[Rinnegan]] and [[Summoning Technique|summoning]] the [[Demonic Statue of the Outer Path]] for the first time.<ref name="ch681"/>
* Its own initial [[Body Coating|merging]] with [[White Zetsu]].<ref name="ch681"/>
* In the anime, the death of one of [[Kakuzu]]'s [[Kakuzu's Partner|former partners]].<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 456</ref>
* The fight between [[Naruto Uzumaki]] and [[Sasuke Uchiha]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 234, page 19</ref>
* The fight between [[Itachi Uchiha]] and [[Sasuke Uchiha]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 396, page 7</ref>
* The fight between [[Kisame Hoshigaki]] and [[Killer B]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 487, page 13</ref>
* [[Kabuto Yakushi]] and [[Obito Uchiha]] teaming up for the [[Fourth Shinobi World War]].<ref name="ch681"/>
* [[Naruto Uzumaki]] and [[Sasuke Uchiha]]'s fight with [[Madara Uchiha]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 676, page 13</ref>

== Trivia ==
* In the anime, Black Zetsu was also capable of showing events that its creator Kaguya witnessed.<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 460</ref>
